016package io.micronaut.maven.testresources;
017
018import io.micronaut.maven.services.DependencyResolutionService;
019import io.micronaut.testresources.buildtools.*;
020import org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession;
021import org.apache.maven.model.Dependency;
022import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
023import org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log;
024import org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.SystemStreamLog;
025import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
026import org.apache.maven.toolchain.ToolchainManager;
027import org.eclipse.aether.artifact.Artifact;
028import org.eclipse.aether.resolution.DependencyResolutionException;
029
030import java.io.File;
031import java.io.IOException;
032import java.nio.file.*;
033import java.nio.file.attribute.BasicFileAttributes;
034import java.util.*;
035import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean;
036import java.util.stream.Stream;
037
038import static io.micronaut.maven.services.DependencyResolutionService.toClasspathFiles;
039import static java.util.stream.Stream.concat;
040
041/**
042 * Utility class to stop Test Resources service.
043 */
044public class TestResourcesHelper {
045
046    private static final String TEST_RESOURCES_PROPERTIES = "test-resources.properties";
047    private static final String PORT_FILE_NAME = "test-resources-port.txt";
048
049    private final boolean enabled;
050
051    private final boolean keepAlive;
052
053    private final boolean shared;
054
055    private final File buildDirectory;
056
057    private final Log log;
058
059    private Integer explicitPort;
060
061    private Integer clientTimeout;
062
063    private MavenProject mavenProject;
064
065    private MavenSession mavenSession;
066
067    private DependencyResolutionService dependencyResolutionService;
068
069    private ToolchainManager toolchainManager;
070
071    private String testResourcesVersion;
072
073    private boolean classpathInference;
074
075    private List<Dependency> testResourcesDependencies;
076
077    private String sharedServerNamespace;
078
079    public TestResourcesHelper(boolean enabled, boolean keepAlive, boolean shared, File buildDirectory,
080                               Integer explicitPort, Integer clientTimeout, MavenProject mavenProject,
081                               MavenSession mavenSession, DependencyResolutionService dependencyResolutionService,
082                               ToolchainManager toolchainManager, String testResourcesVersion,
083                               boolean classpathInference, List<Dependency> testResourcesDependencies,
084                               String sharedServerNamespace) {
085        this(enabled, keepAlive, shared, buildDirectory);
086        this.explicitPort = explicitPort;
087        this.clientTimeout = clientTimeout;
088        this.mavenProject = mavenProject;
089        this.mavenSession = mavenSession;
090        this.dependencyResolutionService = dependencyResolutionService;
091        this.toolchainManager = toolchainManager;
092        this.testResourcesVersion = testResourcesVersion;
093        this.classpathInference = classpathInference;
094        this.testResourcesDependencies = testResourcesDependencies;
095        this.sharedServerNamespace = sharedServerNamespace;
096    }
097
098    public TestResourcesHelper(boolean enabled, boolean keepAlive, boolean shared, File buildDirectory) {
099        this.enabled = enabled;
100        this.keepAlive = keepAlive;
101        this.shared = shared;
102        this.buildDirectory = buildDirectory;
103        this.log = new SystemStreamLog();
104    }
105
106    /**
107     * Starts the Test Resources Service.
108     */
109    public void start() throws MojoExecutionException {
110        if (!enabled) {
111            return;
112        }
113        try {
114            doStart();
115        } catch (Exception e) {
116            throw new MojoExecutionException("Unable to start test resources server", e);
117        }
118    }
119
120    private void doStart() throws IOException {
121        if (shared) {
122            if (sharedServerNamespace != null) {
123                log.info("Test Resources is configured in shared mode with the namespace: " + sharedServerNamespace);
124            } else {
125                log.info("Test Resources is configured in shared mode");
126            }
127        }
128        String accessToken = UUID.randomUUID().toString();
129        Path buildDir = buildDirectory.toPath();
130        Path serverSettingsDirectory = getServerSettingsDirectory();
131        AtomicBoolean serverStarted = new AtomicBoolean(false);
132        ServerFactory serverFactory = new DefaultServerFactory(log, toolchainManager, mavenSession, serverStarted);
133        startOrConnectToExistingServer(accessToken, buildDir, serverSettingsDirectory, serverFactory);
134        if (serverStarted.get()) {
135            if (keepAlive) {
136                log.info("Micronaut Test Resources service is started in the background. To stop it, run the following command: 'mvn mn:" + StopTestResourcesServerMojo.NAME + "'");
137            }
138        } else {
139            // A server was already listening, which means it was running before
140            // the build was started, so we put a file to indicate to the stop
141            // mojo that it should not stop the server.
142            Path keepalive = getKeepAliveFile();
143            Files.write(keepalive, "true".getBytes());
144        }
145        // In order for the test resources client to connect, we need
146        // to copy the test resources file to the test classes directory
147        copyServerSettingsToClasspath(buildDir, serverSettingsDirectory);
148    }
149
150    private void startOrConnectToExistingServer(String accessToken, Path buildDir, Path serverSettingsDirectory, ServerFactory serverFactory) {
151        try {
152            ServerUtils.startOrConnectToExistingServer(
153                    explicitPort,
154                    buildDir.resolve(PORT_FILE_NAME),
155                    serverSettingsDirectory,
156                    accessToken,
157                    resolveServerClasspath(),
158                    clientTimeout,
159                    serverFactory
160            );
161        } catch (Exception e) {
162            log.error("Error starting Micronaut Test Resources service", e);
163        }
164    }
165
166    private void copyServerSettingsToClasspath(Path buildDir, Path serverSettingsDirectory) throws IOException {
167        Path testClassesDir = buildDir.resolve("test-classes");
168        if (!Files.exists(testClassesDir)) {
169            Files.createDirectories(testClassesDir);
170        }
171        Files.copy(serverSettingsDirectory.resolve(TEST_RESOURCES_PROPERTIES), testClassesDir.resolve(TEST_RESOURCES_PROPERTIES), StandardCopyOption.REPLACE_EXISTING);
172    }
173
174    private List<File> resolveServerClasspath() throws DependencyResolutionException {
175        List<MavenDependency> applicationDependencies = Collections.emptyList();
176        if (classpathInference) {
177            applicationDependencies = getApplicationDependencies();
178        }
179        Stream<Artifact> serverDependencies =
180                TestResourcesClasspath.inferTestResourcesClasspath(applicationDependencies, testResourcesVersion)
181                        .stream()
182                        .map(DependencyResolutionService::testResourcesDependencyToAetherArtifact);
183
184        List<org.apache.maven.model.Dependency> extraDependencies =
185                testResourcesDependencies != null ? testResourcesDependencies : Collections.emptyList();
186
187        Stream<Artifact> extraDependenciesStream = extraDependencies.stream()
188                .map(DependencyResolutionService::mavenDependencyToAetherArtifact);
189
190        Stream<Artifact> artifacts = concat(serverDependencies, extraDependenciesStream);
191
192        return toClasspathFiles(dependencyResolutionService.artifactResultsFor(artifacts, true));
193    }
194
195    private List<MavenDependency> getApplicationDependencies() {
196        return this.mavenProject.getDependencies().stream()
197                .map(DependencyResolutionService::mavenDependencyToTestResourcesDependency)
198                .toList();
199    }
200
201    /**
202     * Contains the logic to stop the Test Resources Service.
203     */
204    public void stop() throws MojoExecutionException {
205        if (!enabled || Boolean.TRUE.equals(keepAlive)) {
206            return;
207        }
208        if (Files.exists(getKeepAliveFile())) {
209            try {
210                Files.delete(getKeepAliveFile());
211            } catch (IOException e) {
212                throw new MojoExecutionException("Failed to delete keepalive file", e);
213            }
214            return;
215        }
216        try {
217            Optional<ServerSettings> optionalServerSettings = ServerUtils.readServerSettings(getServerSettingsDirectory());
218            if (optionalServerSettings.isPresent() && ServerUtils.isServerStarted(optionalServerSettings.get().getPort())) {
219                log.info("Shutting down Micronaut Test Resources service");
220                doStop();
221            }
222        } catch (Exception e) {
223            throw new MojoExecutionException("Unable to stop test resources server", e);
224        }
225    }
226
227    private void doStop() throws IOException {
228        Path settingsDirectory = getServerSettingsDirectory();
229        ServerUtils.stopServer(settingsDirectory);
230        Files.walkFileTree(settingsDirectory, new SimpleFileVisitor<>() {
231            @Override
232            public FileVisitResult visitFile(Path file, BasicFileAttributes attrs) throws IOException {
233                Files.delete(file);
234                return super.visitFile(file, attrs);
235            }
236
237            @Override
238            public FileVisitResult postVisitDirectory(Path dir, IOException exc) throws IOException {
239                Files.delete(dir);
240                return super.postVisitDirectory(dir, exc);
241            }
242        });
243    }
244
245    private Path getServerSettingsDirectory() {
246        if (shared) {
247            return ServerUtils.getDefaultSharedSettingsPath(sharedServerNamespace);
248        }
249        return serverSettingsDirectoryOf(buildDirectory.toPath());
250    }
251
252    private Path getKeepAliveFile() {
253        return getServerSettingsDirectory().resolve("keepalive");
254    }
255
256    private Path serverSettingsDirectoryOf(Path buildDir) {
257        return buildDir.resolve("../.micronaut/test-resources");
258    }
259
260    /**
261     * @param sharedServerNamespace The shared server namespace (if any).
262     */
263    public void setSharedServerNamespace(String sharedServerNamespace) {
264        this.sharedServerNamespace = sharedServerNamespace;
265    }
266}
